collection.name: Assassin VineCommon
collection.entry: Smaller vines extend from the main branch and bear clusters of grape-like berries. Stringy bark. Hand-shaped leaves

collection.name: AthachCommon
collection.entry: Extra arm growing out of chest. Large, curved tusks on either side of a wide mouth. Relatively small eyes and nose for the size of the head. One ear significantly bigger than the other. Quite strong stench.

collection.name: BabauCommon
collection.entry: Terrible stench. Skull is tall and long with pointed ears and jaws filled with jagged teeth. A single long horn juts from the back of the skull, curving forward and downward.

collection.name: Barbed Devil (Hamatula)Common
collection.entry: Body completely covered in barbs. Horned hands ending in strange, lengthy claws. Long, burly tails coated in spines

collection.entry: Disgusting, wiry beard. Pointed ears and long tail. Clawed hands and feet.

collection.entry: Disgusting, wiry beard infested with maggots. Pointed ears and long tail. Clawed hands and feet.

collection.name: BebilithCommon
collection.entry: Like a massive, misshapen spider. Tough, chitinous, mottled exoskeleton. Two forelegs end in razor-sharp barbs. Fangs drip globs of odorous liquid.

collection.name: BeholderCommon
collection.entry: A giant eye surrounded by smaller eye stalks. Has a massive, gaping maw.

collection.name: BeholderUncommon
collection.entry: A giant eye surrounded by smaller eye stalks. Has a massive, gaping maw. Nostrils and jointed, articulated eyestalks.

collection.name: Gauth (Lesser Beholder)Common
collection.entry: A giant eye surrounded by smaller eye stalks, along with feeding tendrils and sprout from the lower half of its body. The central eye is surrounded by a ridge of flesh and smaller eyes used for sight. Has a massive, gaping maw.

collection.name: Gauth (Lesser Beholder)Uncommon
collection.entry: A giant eye surrounded by smaller eye stalks, along with feeding tendrils and sprout from the lower half of its body. The central eye is surrounded by a ridge of flesh and smaller eyes used for sight. Has a massive, gaping maw. Nostrils and jointed, articulated eyestalks.

collection.name: BelkerCommon
collection.entry: Primarily composed of smoke, has large, black, bat-like wings, clawed tendrils, and a biting maw. Base form was sort of demonic, but continually shifts and changes shape due to its semi-gaseous nature.

collection.name: BisonMaleCommon
collection.entry: Distinctive broad head that connects to large, humped shoulders with a thick neck. Short, curved, hollow horns growing from the sides of its head. Body covered in fur. Head covered in a mantle of thick fur, chin with a black beard-like growth. Short legs. Small tail ending in a tassel of fur.

collection.name: BisonCommon
collection.entry: Distinctive broad head that connects to large, humped shoulders with a thick neck. Short, curved, hollow horns growing from the sides of its head. Body covered in fur. Head covered in a mantle of thick fur. Short legs. Small tail ending in a tassel of fur.

collection.name: BoarCommon
collection.entry: Sharp tusks jutting out from beneath the snout

collection.name: Dire BoarCommon
collection.entry: Sharp tusks jutting out from beneath the snout

collection.name: BodakCommon
collection.entry: Face twisted into an inhuman visage of sheer madness and horror

collection.name: Bone Devil (Osyluth)Common
collection.entry: Incredibly gaunt husk of a frame so emaciated that it seems skeletal. Tail of a giant scorpion while head looks like menacing skulls. The putrid stench of rot surrounds it.

collection.name: BugbearCommon
collection.entry: Large, hairy, wedge-shaped ears; tough hide; claws

collection.name: BuletteCommon
collection.entry: Covered in thick, layered plates. Hea dis bullet-shaped, similar to a shark's, with a massive mouth. Stumpy but powerful legs.

collection.name: Carrion CrawlerCommon
collection.entry: Eight long tentacles protruding from the side of the head

collection.name: Chaos BeastCommon
collection.entry: A towering thing of pulpy flesh and exposed veins, covered in fangs and hooks. Three legs upon which it walks with unsteady and lurching steps. Face is fractured, with bent eyes and nose hooked three times.

A filmy mass of rope-like tentacles with vermilion tips that slither along. Bulbous body ringed by gnashing mouths and topped by a viscous sac holding ten bobbing eyes. Dozens of vestigial wings that flap too feebly to give it flight.
A powerful and muscular beast, armed with claws and alligator jaws.
A graceful six-legged creature with delicate arms and shining skin. Maned head with three flashing eyes. Walks with a smooth gait and noble bearing.
A man-sized creature with stumpy feet - can only shuffle. Hands like crab's claws. Body like dough falling from broken bones. Head is balding and pitted with empty eye sockets.
A slender raptor-like creature with large talons underneath its body and broad wings, all covered with dark fur. Two hateful, coldly-gleaming eyes.

A sac of intestines, warm and wet and steaming. Both deaf and blind. To move, it rolls and flops like limp sausages falling down stairs, becoming looped and draped around all obstacles and lying as a tangled sprawl.
A hollowed-out carcass, swelling with gases into a balloon-like husk, bobbing along in the air with the ends of its body trailing about it and tangling others.
A plump moth with brilliantly colored wings like the stained glass of temples and compound eyes that sparkle like a myriad of jewels.
A writhing mass of teeth and barbed tentacles, grey and rotting. Random clawed hands hide under some of the tentacles.
DM Discretion - come up with something particularly chaotic

collection.name: CheetahCommon
collection.entry: Slender body, long thin legs, deep chest, small head

collection.name: Chimera (Black Dragon head)Common
collection.entry: Hindquarters of a goat, the forequarters of a lion, and a set of Black Dragon wings. Three heads: that of a horned goat, a lion, and a Black Dragon.

collection.name: Chimera (Blue Dragon head)Common
collection.entry: Hindquarters of a goat, the forequarters of a lion, and a set of Blue Dragon wings. Three heads: that of a horned goat, a lion, and a Blue Dragon.

collection.name: Chimera (Green Dragon head)Common

collection.name: Chimera (Red Dragon head)Common
collection.entry: Hindquarters of a goat, the forequarters of a lion, and a set of Red Dragon wings. Three heads: that of a horned goat, a lion, and a Red Dragon.

collection.name: Chimera (White Dragon head)Common
collection.entry: Hindquarters of a goat, the forequarters of a lion, and a set of White Dragon wings. Three heads: that of a horned goat, a lion, and a White Dragon.

collection.name: ChokerCommon
collection.entry: Roughly humanoid, with a small torso and head. Arms and legs are long and thin, more like tentacles. Hands are shaped somewhat like a starfish, with a spiny surface—stiff cartilage jutting through the skin. Fingers are enormously long. Limbs move with the fluidity of tentacles.

collection.name: ChuulCommon
collection.entry: Four long legs and two large crustacean-like claws. Fan-like tail. Mass of tentacles around the mouth.

collection.name: CloakerCommon
collection.entry: Long, whiplike tail. Head set within the "cowl" of the cloak-like body. Toothy maw. Bony claws adjacent to the head look almost like clasps for the cloak.

collection.name: CloakerUncommon
collection.entry: Long, whiplike tail. Head set within the "cowl" of the cloak-like body. Toothy maw. Bony claws adjacent to the head look almost like clasps for the cloak. A series of spots run in two parallel lines down the backs, giving the appearance of buttons.

collection.name: CockatriceMaleCommon
collection.entry: Lizard-like tail, wings of a bat, rooster's red wattle and comb

collection.name: CockatriceCommon
collection.entry: Lizard-like tail, wings of a bat

collection.name: CouatlCommon
collection.entry: Long feathered serpent with a pair of rainbow-feathered wings.

collection.name: CriosphinxCommon
collection.entry: Falcon-like wings, ram-like head. Tawny lion body. Mouth full of sharp teeth.

collection.name: DeinonychusCommon
collection.entry: Small body, sleek horizontal posture, ratite-like spine, and enlarged raptorial claws on the feet. A large, sickle-shaped talon is on the second toe of each hind foot.

collection.name: DelverCommon
collection.entry: Huge teardrop-shaped body with rock-like skin, always covered in a mucus-like slime. Almost the entire underside of the body consists of their mouth. Only two flipper-like appendages at the front of the body ending in blunt claws

collection.name: DestrachanCommon
collection.entry: Bipedal, vaguely reptilian. Head is largely featureless except for the circular mouth and the large ear structures.

collection.name: DevourerCommon
collection.entry: Tall, gaunt skeletal figure with a smaller figure trapped within its rib cage

collection.name: DigesterCommon
collection.entry: Two powerful hind legs. Long tail. Head is narrow with a sucking mouth, sporting a tube-like orifice on the forehead.

collection.name: Displacer BeastCommon
collection.entry: Panther-like with six legs and a pair of tentacles sprouting from their shoulders. Tentacles end in pads with sharp, horny, brownish-yellow edges

collection.name: Displacer BeastUncommon
collection.entry: Panther-like with six legs and a pair of tentacles sprouting from their shoulders. Tentacles end in pads with sharp, horny, brownish-yellow edges. Emaciated-looking.

collection.name: Displacer Beast Pack LordCommon
collection.entry: Panther-like with six legs and a pair of tentacles sprouting from their shoulders. Tentacles end in pads with sharp, horny, brownish-yellow edges

collection.name: Displacer Beast Pack LordUncommon
collection.entry: Panther-like with six legs and a pair of tentacles sprouting from their shoulders. Tentacles end in pads with sharp, horny, brownish-yellow edges. Emaciated-looking.

collection.name: HyenaCommon
collection.entry: Short torso, long legs, thick and elongated neck, large and high-set ears

collection.name: DoppelgangerCommon
collection.entry: Elven ears. Bulbous head with formless face.

collection.name: Black Dragon, WyrmlingCommon
collection.entry: Broad nasal openings, making its face look like a skull. Segmented horns the curve forward and down, somewhat like a ram's horns, but not as curly. These horns are bone-colored near their bases, but darken to dead black at the tips. One inch of deteriorated flesh around the horns and cheekbones, as though eaten by acid, leaving only thin layers of hide covering the skull. Most teeth protrude when the mouth is closed. Big spikes stud the lower jaw. Small horns jut from the chin, and a row of hornlets crown the head.

collection.name: Blue Dragon, WyrmlingCommon
collection.entry: Dramatic frilled ears. A single horn atop its short, blunt head. The horn juts forward from a base that takes up most of the top of the head. The horn has two points, with the primary slightly curved and reaching well forward, with the smaller secondary point behind. Rows of hornlets line the brow ridges and run back from the nostrils along the entire length of the head. Short snout with underslung lower jaw. Cluster of bladelike scales under its chin and hornlets on its cheeks. Most teeth protrude when its mouth is closed.

Cluster of bladelike scales under its chin and hornlets on its cheeks. Most teeth protrude when its mouth is closed.

collection.name: Bronze Dragon, WyrmlingCommon
collection.entry: Ribbed and fluted crest sweeping back from the cheeks and eyes. Ribs in the crest end in curving horns. The horns are smooth, dark, and oval in cross-section, curving slightly inward toward the spine. Large horns on the top of the head. Beaklike snout. Small head frill and tall neck frill. Webbed feet and webbing behind the forelimbs.

collection.name: Copper Dragon, WyrmlingCommon
collection.entry: Thick thighs and shoulders. Short face, no beak. Broad, smooth browplates jut over the eyes. Long, flat, coppery horns extend back from the browplates in a series of segments. Backswept cheek ridges and frills on the back of the lower jaw that sweep forward slightly. One layer of triangular blades point down from the chin.

collection.name: ElephantCommon
collection.entry: Large, pointed, triangular ears cover the whole shoulder.

collection.name: Aquatic ElfCommon
collection.entry: Pointed ears. Long fingers and toes with thick webbing. Gills visible on the neck and ribs

collection.name: Ethereal FilcherCommon
collection.entry: One foot. Four arms ending in hands with long, spindly fingers. Looks as if it has two heads, one on a long stalk of a neck and another on its abdomen.

collection.name: EttercapCommon
collection.entry: Distended underbelly. Spider-like face, with fangs and multiple eyes. Two sharp, black, chitinous claws instead of hands and feet.

collection.name: EttinCommon
collection.entry: Two heads. Horrid stench. Shovel jaws with lower canine teeth that protrude out like boar tusks.

collection.name: Giant Fire BeetleCommon
collection.entry: Red bioluminescent glands above each eye and near the abdomen

collection.name: Formian MyrmarchCommon
collection.entry: Claws capable of fine manipulation, like human hands

collection.name: Formian QueenCommon
collection.entry: Body too large to allow for movement on her weak, atrophied legs

collection.name: Formian WorkerCommon
collection.entry: Hands only suitable for manual labor

collection.name: KolyarutCommon
collection.entry: Golden-hued banded-mail armor. Flowing red robe.

collection.name: MarutCommon
collection.entry: Resembles a massive statue made entirely of onyx, humanoid in form but composed of mechanical components. Clad in golden armor.

collection.name: ZelekhutCommon
collection.entry: Looks like a mechanical centaur, with skin as white as alabaster and clad in golden plate armor. A pair of golden metallic wings unfold from its back when needed.
Looks like a clockwork centaur, with skin as white as alabaster and clad in golden plate armor. A pair of golden metallic wings unfold from its back when needed.

collection.name: Frost WormCommon
collection.entry: Huge mandibles. Nodule from which it emits a trilling noise.

collection.name: Hill GiantCommon

collection.name: Gibbering MoutherCommon
collection.entry: Large blob of mouth and eyes

collection.name: GirallonCommon
collection.entry: Four arms. Curved tusks in its mouth.

collection.name: GithyankiCommon
collection.entry: Pointed ears, serrated in the back. Long angular skull, with a small and highly-placed flat nose. Pointed teeth.

collection.name: GithzeraiFemaleCommon
collection.entry: Long angular skull, flattened nose, long pointed ears

collection.name: GithzeraiMaleCommon
collection.entry: Long angular skull, flattened nose, long pointed ears

collection.name: GlabrezuCommon
collection.entry: Two pairs of arms: main arms (from the shoulders) are larger and end in pincers, smaller pair (from the stomach) is humanoid with clawed fingers. Goat horns atop the canine head. Numerous fangs in the muzzle.

collection.name: GoblinCommon
collection.entry: Flat face, small fangs, pointed ears, sloped-back forehead, broad noses

collection.name: Flesh GolemCommon
collection.entry: Various decaying humanoid body parts stitched and bolted together

collection.entry: Looks like a carved statue, stylized by its creator

collection.name: Gray RenderCommon
collection.entry: Extra long arms drag on the ground.

collection.name: Green HagCommon

collection.name: GrickCommon

collection.entry: Humanoid body; head of a dog

collection.name: HowlerCommon
collection.entry: Bruised, crushed digits ending in claws on the front legs. Back legs end in hooves. Back like an ox. Muzzled, simian face.

collection.name: Ice Devil (Gelugon)Common
collection.entry: Insectoid. Hands and feet end in claws. Long thick tail surrounded in spikes. Set of antennae on the head. Sharp mandibles

collection.name: ImpCommon
collection.entry: Leathery bat-like wings. Prehensile tail ending in stinger. Small, sharp, twisting, gleaming-white horns. White fangs.

collection.name: Invisible StalkerCommon
collection.entry: Amorphous form. See Invisibility reveals a dim outline of a cloud. True Seeing reveals a roiling cloud of vapor

collection.name: KoboldCommon

Long, clawed fingers. Jaw like a crocodile. Small tan horns on the head. Rat-like tail

collection.name: KrakenCommon
collection.entry: Squid-like. Two of the ten tentacles are longer and have deadly barbs. Fins protrude from the upper part of the elongated central body

collection.name: KrensharCommon

collection.name: Kuo-toaCommon

collection.name: LammasuCommon

collection.name: LemureCommon

collection.name: LillendCommon

collection.name: LocathahCommon

collection.name: MarilithCommon

collection.name: StirgeCommon
collection.entry: Resembles a monstrous cross between a large bat and an oversized mosquito. Short and furry body in shades of rusty red. Yellowish eyes. Wings are membranous and bat-like, interlaced with thin-walled blood vessels. Four eight-jointed legs ending in sharp pincers. Long, sharp needle-like proboscis, pink at the tip and fades to grey at the base.
